summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Alley between 7th Avenue West and 8th Avenue West, from West Highland Drive to West Blaine Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6099 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
